name: YAPRTAN - Yet Another Pong Remake That Adds Nothing
name_original: YAPRTAN - Yet Another Pong Remake That Adds Nothing
description:
I am a beginner learning unity and what do you remake first to learn? Of course Pong!

 One of the first games ever made to make one of your first games. 

I know it is not very good , even main menu is bad. Still wanted to share my first game that could be played and I am really happy about creating something. Have fun and see you in my next project hopefully that will come out soon. Bye.
